text:
e="preserve">Branko Cikatić (4 October 1955 – 22 March 2020) was a Croatian heavyweight kickboxer and actor. He was the first Croatian-born fighter to have international success. He was the first K-1 World Grand Prix Champion. The tournament was held on April 30, 1993 in Japan. He played a villain in a 1997 B-movie "Skyscraper".
In 2018, Cikatić had a pulmonary embolism and later sepsis. He was later diagnosed with Parkinson's disease.
